MAN.TITLE: cell2mat
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: convert a cell array into a matrix

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : cell, the components of c must have the same type and can be scalars or matrices

DESCRIPTION.P: Returns a matrix which is the concatenation of all components of the cell c.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: cell2mat(c)
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : all components of c must have the same data type (strings or doubles or integers or booleans). For each row i of c, cell2mat concatenates all the components of the ith row of the cell c

DESCRIPTION.P: Note that if the components of the cell input c are strings then cell2mat(c) returns a column vector of strings concatenation
